tool_description: There are some captchas that are made by TEXT patterns. This API solve them.
name: Text Captcha Solver
title: Text Captcha Solver

api_list.name: /txtCaptcha
api_list.description: Solves a text captcha by providing the input text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://text-captcha-solver1.p.rapidapi.com/txtCaptcha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-captcha-solver1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://text-captcha-solver1.p.rapidapi.com/txtCaptcha"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "text-captcha-solver1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
